entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
